title: Man's Trousers and Sash
description: a. trousers-natural color; 42 X 17 1/2 inches; b. sash-red ground with discontinuous supplementary weft patterning of geometric motifs in blue, green, and yellow  woven on body tension loom; 112 1/2 X 11 1/2 inches
